com.fangcloud.sdk.auth

Class YfyEnterpriseAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fangcloud.sdk.auth.YfyEnterpriseAuth

  • public class YfyEnterpriseAuth
extends Object
    Does the "jwt" flow.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      YfyEnterpriseAuth(YfyRequestConfig requestConfig, String kid, Key key)
      Creates a new instance that will perform the OAuth2 jwt flow using the given OAuth request configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      YfyAuthFinish getEnterpriseToken(long enterpriseId)
      Get the enterprise token witch can used to invoke admin api,such as managing departments and groups

      Get the user token witch can used to invoke personal api,such as get folder information

                                        int expirationTimeSeconds)
                                 throws YfyException
        Get the enterprise token witch can used to invoke admin api,such as managing departments and groups
        Parameters:
        enterpriseId - Your enterprise id
        expirationTimeSeconds - Expiration time seconds in the future(can not be bigger than 60)
        Returns:
        Detailed user access information
        Throws:
        YfyException
